thread.title: Former Fayette County police officer pleads guilty to depriving man of civil rights
thread.title_full: Former Fayette County police officer pleads guilty to depriving man of civil rights

title: Former Fayette County police officer pleads guilty to depriving man of civil rights
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Region - Today 
A former Fayette County police officer pleaded guilty today to depriving a man of his civil rights in connection with an assault in 2013.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
